page.title: 02West Sherford Farm, Brixton
page.content: West Sherford is a mixed farm of which Mr.Haimes is the tenant.The farm covers an area of 253 acres. The farm_house dates back to the 11th century and was at one time owned by Sir Francis Drake. Mr.Haimes owns 95 cows which include Blonde d'Aquitaines and pure bred Friesians. Blonde d'Aquitaines are kept for meat, and Friesians are kept for milk. The cows are fed on the cereal that Mr.Haimes produces. 100 acres of the farm is used for the production of crops. Grass and cereals are grown at the farm. Barley is the main winter crop. Artificial fertilizer is used to supplement organic material from the farm. Chemical control of pests and weeds is also used. West Sherford is one of the larger farms in the block.
